> Nightstrike left his hideout and opened fire agaisnt both bots
> and left quickly the place flying towards Atlantis
> 
> Lord Elder dropped and rolled. Once back on his feet he returned
> fire with three shots.
> 
> Elder: He is heading towards Atlantis!

"UNDERSTOOD." Legacy responded, his voice cold and resonate. 

Legacy raised his left arm, the one that ended not in a hand but in a powerful crimson hued cannon! Swiftly it began to glow as energy was focused along its length, causing the tip end of it to glow brightly. Then with a startling abruptness it fired an intence blast of pure energy at the fleeing Nightstrike. 

(Tag Nightstrike?)

"UNFORTUNATLY MY POWER SYSTEMS REQUIRE ENERGY TO CONTINUE A PROLONGED BATTLE. IT HAD COST MUCH TO ARRIVE AT THESE TIME/SPACE COORDINATES." 

From behind his shoulders twin sets solar panels rose and oriented themselves, glinting in the sun as they turned. 

"I HAVE SUFFICIENT POWER TO CONTINUE THIS HERE, BUT WILL REQUIRE TIME TO AQUIRE A SUFFICIENT ENERGY RESERVE."

(Tag Elder)

Preston
(Legacy)
